script.text: The current data in the Definition snapshot file are the same as the data in the current delta file.
The current data in the Association refset snapshot file are the same as the data in the current delta file.
The current data in the AttributeValue refset snapshot file are the same as the data in the current delta file.
The current data in the Simple refset snapshot file are the same as the data in the current delta file.
The current data in the SimpleMap refset snapshot file are the same as the data in the current delta file.
The current data in the Language refset snapshot file are the same as the data in the current delta file.
The current Concept snapshot file is the same as that in the previous release, except for the component that changed in the current release.
ID is unique in CONCEPT snapshot.
script.keywords: ID is unique in CONCEPT snapshot.

script.text: New inactive states follow active states in the CONCEPT snapshot.
script.keywords: New inactive states follow active states in the CONCEPT snapshot.

script.text: ID is unique in DESCRIPTION snapshot.
script.keywords: ID is unique in DESCRIPTION snapshot.

script.text: New inactive states follow active states in the DESCRIPTION snapshot.
script.keywords: New inactive states follow active states in the DESCRIPTION snapshot.

script.text: ConceptId value refers to valid concept identifier in DESCRIPTION snapshot.
script.keywords: ConceptId value refers to valid concept identifier in DESCRIPTION snapshot.

script.text: There is a 1:1 relationship between the id and the immutable values in DESCRIPTION snapshot.
script.keywords: There is a 1:1 relationship between the id and the immutable values in DESCRIPTION snapshot.

script.text: ID is unique in the DEFINITION snapshot.
script.keywords: ID is unique in the DEFINITION snapshot.

script.text: There is a 1:1 relationship between the id and the immutable values in DEFINITION snapshot.

script.text: New inactive states follow active states in the DEFINITION snapshot file.

script.text: ConceptId value refers to valid concept identifier in the DEFINITION snapshot.

script.text: There are zero definitions or there is one definition per concept in the DEFINITION snapshot.
script.keywords: There are zero definitions or there is one definition per concept in the DEFINITION snapshot.

script.text: All members inactivated in current release must have been active in the previous release.
All members refer to a description that is referenced in either the description table or the text definition table.
The current Language Refset snapshot file does not contain duplicate Member Ids.
Every concept's FSN exists exactly once in each language refset.
Every concept's Preferred Term exists exactly once in each language refset.
